title: Integrability Test for Spin Chains
abstract: We examine a simple heuristic test of integrability for quantum chains. This test is applied to a variety of systems, including a generic isotropic spin-1 model with nearest-neighbor interactions and a multiparameter family of spin-1/2 models generalizing the XYZ chain, with next-to-nearest neighbor interactions and bond alternation. Within the latter family we determine all the integrable models with an o(2) symmetry.
